required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study To Test The Interaction of Two Medications for Treatment of Overactive Bladder
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Repeat Dose Study to Investigate the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of Solabegron (GW427353) in Combination With Oxybutynin in Healthy Adult Subjects.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of repeat doses of solabegron and oxybutynin when taken alone or together

primary_outcome.measure: Absorption rate of solabegron and oxybutynin
primary_outcome.time_frame: as measured by multiple blood draws after repeat dosing

secondary_outcome.time_frame: prior to dosing Session 1 and post dose for each session
